original_text: Otherwise I should have wrought falsehood against mine own life: for there is no matter hid from the king, and thou thyself wouldest have set thyself against me.
korean_text: 아무 일도 왕 앞에는 숨길 수 없나니 내가 만일 거역하여 그의 생명을 해하였더라면 당신도 나를 대적하였으리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Otherwise I should have wrought falsehood
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않았다면 내가 거짓을 행했을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for there is no matter hid
wouldest have set thyself against me
